gifts.name: Harley Davidson -Street 750
gifts.description: Well it's a Harley, like most men a lifelong dream of Dam, enough said I think

gifts.name: Trip to Dubai Shopping festival
gifts.description: Like all good Mallu's they have a strong connection with the "Gelf", Sandhya's dying to make her first Dubai trip with Dam and visit her brother and family , giving them wings would make this dream come true

gifts.name: Rent for a year/security deposit
gifts.description: While they are staying at Dam's place to begin with they dearly hope to soon get a place of their own once they have the money, any push in this direction would be amazing

gifts.name: Wooden bar & Harman sound dock
gifts.description: You know how they both love to entertain and two things that would really help them would be a well stocked bar and a Bose sound dock

gifts.name: Trip To Goa
gifts.description: It's undoubtedly their favourite holiday destination and I know they would love a trip this year without worrying about how to finance it and where to scrimp

gifts.name: Couple Gym Membership for a year
gifts.description: Well you've seen how these two have slimmed down this past year, with Dam's mothers cooking available anytime they need all the help they can get to keep fit

gifts.name: Music System for Car
gifts.description: Sandhya's most favourite thing in the world after her future husband( I think after) is her sturdy 14 year old Mitsubishi Lancer that she's bringing along and post the wedding this will be the official couple car wherever the go. Sadly a decent music system is lacking in this Japanese beauty

gifts.name: Sofa from Fabindia
gifts.description: Dam's room is soon gonna have it's occupancy doubled and a nice single seater sofa in the corner would be much needed to keep things comfy

gifts.name: Spa Day
gifts.description: Its been a crazy couple of months for the couple, from wedding prep to invitations and all the other chaos that comes with getting hitched, a day at a spa seems apt to wind down once its all over

gifts.name: Double Quilt from Portico
gifts.description: Ever since these two were little kids their favourite part about staying in hotels were the big fluffy white quilts and funnily enough thatâ€™s something that still excites them to this day, so we thought it would be nice to bring that fluffy quilt home
